channel.title: CVE Feed for HUAWEI -- HUAWEI Mate 10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HUAWEI -- HUAWEI Mate 10

item.title: CVE-2020-1809|2024-08-04T06:46:30.900Z -- huawei -- huawei%20mate%2010
item.description: HUAWEI Mate 10 smartphones with versions earlier than 10.0.0.143(C00E143R2P4) have an information disclosure vulnerability. The attacker could wake up voice assistant then do a series of crafted voice operation, successful exploit could allow the attacker read certain files without unlock the phone leading to information disclosure.
